vote.title: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for tree maintenance and emergency storm response services - Shawnee Mission Tree Service, Inc. dba Arbor Masters Tree Service in the estimated amount of $26,755,162.40 and Good Earth Corporation in the estimated amount of $707,871.00, lowest responsible bidders of two - Total estimated amount of $27,463,033.40 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,748,420.40), Sanitation Operation Fund ($25,330,000.00), Storm Drainage Management Fund ($247,099.00), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($127,548.00), Aviation Fund ($7,931.00), and Equipment and Fleet Management Fund ($2,035.00)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for tree maintenance and emergency storm response services - Shawnee Mission Tree Service, Inc. dba Arbor Masters Tree Service in the estimated amount of $26,755,162.40 and Good Earth Corporation in the estimated amount of $707,871.00, lowest responsible bidders of two - Total estimated amount of $27,463,033.40 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,748,420.40), Sanitation Operation Fund ($25,330,000.00), Storm Drainage Management Fund ($247,099.00), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($127,548.00), Aviation Fund ($7,931.00), and Equipment and Fleet Management Fund ($2,035.00)
